headline: One-Pot Keto Jambalaya with Cauliflower Rice
description: Try this keto version of traditional jambalaya with cauliflower rice, andouille sausage, and chicken thighs for a Louisiana-inspired dinner.
name: One-Pot Keto Jambalaya with Cauliflower Rice
recipeIngredient: 1 pound skinless, boneless chicken thighs, cut into 1-inch pieces
14 ounces andouille sausage, cut lengthwise and sliced crosswise into 1/4-inch slices
1 (10 ounce) can diced tomatoes with green chiles (such as Rotel®), drained slightly
1 pound frozen raw shrimp, peeled and deveined
freshly ground black pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Melt ghee in a large Dutch oven over medium heat. Add bell pepper, celery, and onion. Cook until vegetables begin to soften and onion turns soft and translucent, 3 to 4 minutes. Add chicken, sliced sausage, Cajun seasoning, and hot sauce. Cook and stir until everything is well combined, 2 to 3 minutes. Add drained tomatoes and stock and bring to a boil.

Reduce heat, cover, and simmer until chicken is cooked through, about 15 minutes. Remove lid and add riced cauliflower, breaking up any clumps while stirring. Add frozen shrimp and increase heat to medium high. Push each shrimp below the surface of the hot tomato sauce and season with black pepper. Bring to a boil and cook until shrimp curls and turn pink in color, 6 to 8 minutes.

review.reviewBody: It was awesome. The only change I made was add 1 hatch chili pepper since they are in season. It was phenomenal and a huge hit with the family.
Everybody was so happy and they kept no repeating! I’m so glad I made it.
So tasty and guilt-free! Great recipe for cold days or when the family has a cold!
So Easy and Delicious! I made it as directed, except used 2 cans of tomato with chilis - reduced the chicken stock. Will make this many more times!
Oh my YUMMY!!!!! This dish is so so good and full of flavor. Didn't even miss the rice. Delicious! Thank you!
Very good and very spicy! I will tone it down next time .
I have to admit did do a few changes, in the seasoning mainly, it turned out fantastic!
Pretty good and easy as directed. Little spicy but very good

item.name: One-Pot Keto Jambalaya with Cauliflower Rice
